oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A 'Hottentot' (or !Ora-speaker) called Auma (Philip, or Jaco'bama) provides Lucy Lloyd with words and sentences in a !Ora dialect. This includes his other names and those of some members of his family as well as parts of the body, numbers, weapons and other items from daily life.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences: given by Auma (Hottentot, Namaqua and Setschuana)
